title: Commentary on the Greater Sutra of the Perfection of Wisdom (Daichido-ron) Vol. 90 (Inside title: Makahannya-haramitsubon Vol. 78) from Ishiyama-dera in Shiga Prefecture
dimensions:
each page (approx.): H. 23.8 x W. 8.1 cm (9 1/2 x 3 3/16 in.)
original handscroll: H. 23.8 x W. 730.1 cm (9 1/2 x 287 7/16 in.)
book (with cover): H. 24.3 x W. 8.5 cm (9 9/16 x 3 3/8 in.)
creditline: Harvard Art Museums/Arthur M. Sackler Museum, Bequest of the Hofer Collection of the Arts of Asia
medium: Handscroll converted into an "orihon" (folded book) (at Ishiyama-dera in 1787); ink on paper, with white punctuation marks and red correction marks
